job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtltugtJob DescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtImportant Note During the application process ensure your contact information email and phone number is up to date and upload your current resume when submitting your application for consideration To participate in some selection activities you will need to respond to an invitation The invitation can be sent by both email and text message In order to receive text message invitations your profile must include a mobile phone number designated as Personal Cell or Cellular in the contact information of your applicationltbrgtltbrgtAt Wells Fargo we are looking for talented people who will put our customers at the center of everything we do We are seeking candidates who embrace diversity equity and inclusion in a workplace where everyone feels valued and inspiredltbrgtltbrgtHelp us build a better Wells Fargo It all begins with outstanding talent It all begins with youltbrgtltbrgtTechnology sets IT strategy enhances the design development and operations of our systems optimizes the Wells Fargo infrastructure provides information security and enables Wells Fargo global customers to have 24 hours a day 7 days a week banking access through inbranch online ATMs and other channelsltbrgtltbrgtOur mission is to deliver stable secure scalable and innovative services at speeds that delight and satisfy our customers and unleash the skills potential of our employeesltbrgtltbrgtWithin the Consumer ampamp Small Business Banking Technology there is an exciting opportunity for an experienced JavaWeb ServicesMicroService senior developer who will be involved in implementing and supporting projects and enterprise releases for middleware business services This position is responsible for design code test debug and document programs using Agile development practices and also provides expert counsel to senior technology leadership and advises and mentors others with the goal of knowledge transfer The position will be part of the development team working in EBS Forms application The role involves design ampamp development of WebservicesMicroService which interact with multiple back end systems and client applications Also working directly with the Product Owner and LOB partners and other technicalbusiness teams in the US time zone providing guidancetechnical assistance to other scrum team members technical analysis and documentation and also help with test automation TDDBDD etc Provides technical assistance in identifying evaluating and developing systems and procedures that are cost effective and meet business requirementsltbrgtltbrgtThe JavaWeb Services Developer will be responsible for but not limited to the followingltbrgtltulgt ltligtDesign develop and test SOAPRESTful Java MicroService in a J2EE environmentltligt ltligtUnderstand overall business function and technical architectureltligt ltligtWork with other SMEs architects analysts and other project team membersltligt ltligtParticipate in all phases of the SDLC including documentation code reviews research and production supportltligt ltligtLead and direct junior team membersltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtRequired Qualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt5 years of software engineering experienceltligtltligt5  years of J2EE experienceltligtltligt5 years of Java experienceltligtltligt5 years of RESTful or SOAP web servicesltligtltligt7 years of development and implementation experience with applications databases or a combination of bothltligtltligt3 years of microservices development experienceltligtltligt2 years of experience in Adobe LiveCycle or AEM productsltligtltligt2 years of Agile experienceltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtDesired QualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtAn industrystandard technology certificationltligtltligtStrong verbal written and interpersonal communication skillsltligtltligtExperience supporting or directing offshore teamsltligtltligtStrong analytical skills and ability to solve complex technical problemsltligtltligtAgile experienceltligtltligtExperience operating effectively in a geographically dispersed organizationltligtltligtA BSBA degree or higher in science or technologyltligtltligtSQL experienceltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtOther Desired Qualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligtKnowledge and understanding of Microservices architecture framework and design patternsltligt ltligtMongoDb knowledge is a plusltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtJob ExpectationsltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtAbility to travel up to 10 of the timeltligtltligtPosition Hours Monday  Friday as early as 7 am and as late as 6 pm ltligtltligtFlexibility to work in a 247 environment including weekends and holidaysltligtltligtFlexibility to address incidents as needed 24 hours a dayltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtStreet AddressltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtNCCharlotte ltstronggt1525 W Wt Harris Blvd  Charlotte NCltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtDisclaimerltbrgtltstronggtltulgtAll offers for employment with Wells Fargo are contingent upon the candidate having successfully completed a criminal background check Wells Fargo will consider qualified candidates with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable local state and Federal law including Section 19 of the Federal Deposit Insurance ActltbrgtltbrgtRelevant military experience is considered for veterans and transitioning service men and womenltbrgtltbrgtWells Fargo is an Affirmative Action and Equal Opportunity Employer MinorityFemaleDisabledVeteranGender IdentitySexual
